description: Support to Gender Mainstreaming in Policy Making in Turkmenistan

subproject.description: Targeted elements of the legal framework for gender equity are    strengthened. The aim of the project is twofold: (1) capacity development of rural women to be engaged into income generating activities and (2) strengthening capacity for gender mainstreaming among policy and decision makers and NGOs.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Gender mainstreaming

title: Gender mainstreaming
